humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, one out of one sentinel lymph node is positive for metastatic carcinoma with extensive involvement of the subcapsular sinus (AJCCpN1 (sn)). This information supports the N1 stage. The other 17 lymph nodes dissected were negative for metastatic carcinoma. New Rule 12 states that N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes, which is consistent with the report.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has one sentinel lymph node positive for metastatic carcinoma with extensive involvement of the subcapsular sinus (AJCCpN1 (sn)). There is no evidence of extranodal extension, and multiple (17) axillary lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage is N1.
